Creates a weighted adjacency matrix of probability of citation between topics

make_topicNetwork.Rd

Creates a weighted adjacency matrix of probability of citation between topics

make_topicNetwork(
  source_ids,
  citation_network,
  type = "NSF_specific",
  percentile.threshold = 0.9
)

Arguments

source_ids

source_ids
citation_network

an edge data.frame

Value

a weighted adjacency matrix of probability of citation between topics
